ygData.subject: Kedge Keep
ygData.msgSnippet: OK speaking from experience here.  Our underwater breathing (UB) song does not override Enduring Breath (EB).  If EB is up and you start singing UB, EB will
ygData.messageBody:
OK speaking from experience here. Our underwater breathing (UB) song does
not override Enduring Breath (EB). If EB is up and you start singing UB, EB
will still be up when you stop singing. However, if you are singing UB and
you don't have EB, EB will not stick if someone tries to cast it on you.
You have to stop UB first in order to get EB to stick. While in Kedge, I
always have UB memmed. Whenever someone announces EB is dropping, I get UB
ready in case they start drowning. Saved a 50 paladin the other night
because of it. To say the least he was glad I had it ready.

Galtin of E'ci

Note to Laluni: I'll be in Kedge tonight around 9PM PST if I can get a ride
from Ogguk. Hope to see you and the rest of DoH there.



> Speaking of kedge... any of you know if our water breathing song overrides
> enduring breath? In other
> words. I'd like to keep it memed in case of emergencies, but will it
> cause everyone else's enduring
> breath's do fade when the 10 seconds are up?
>
> Laluni Songhammer
>
>
